about_the_game:
Amateur ghost hunters seeking a cheap thrill become a nightmare. Your choice matters, will you leave it uninfluenced or forever changed? 

  • Explore haunted facilities

  • Capture spirits on camera

  • If needed, clear the area of dark spirits

Halloween is approaching and you and your friends decide to go on a ghost adventure in the nearby "supposably" haunted abandoned hospital. There you will try to communicate with spirits and capture it on video.

You are equipped with the state-of-the-art ghost-hunting equipment money can buy. The full spectrum camera can reveal what human eyes cannot see and a spirit box to capture disembodied sounds. You also build up your medium perception of the spirit world. As you explore and interact with the spirits, your connection becomes stronger. But beware, not everything you talk to has good intentions.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i7-6700 or Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060 6GB or Radeon RX 580 8GB
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

  • OS: Windows 10
